```{r, echo = {{baseline_ranking_knit}}, include = {{baseline_ranking_knit}}}
if ({{baseline_ranking_rank_style}} == "radial"){
  radial_all <- RadialSUCRA(baseline_ranking, {{baseline_ranking_colourblind}})
  if (!{{baseline_ranking_simple}}){
    radial_all$Original
  } else {
    radial_all$Alternative
  }
} else {
  LitmusRankOGram(baseline_ranking, {{baseline_ranking_colourblind}})
}
```
